hero.title: VideoSOS
hero.subtitle: AI Video Editor
hero.description: A powerful, open-source AI video editor built for creators. Create stunning videos with our intuitive tools, or develop your own AI video product using our kit.

features.title: Powerful features for modern creators
features.subtitle: Everything you need to create professional-quality videos, available to everyone.

preciseEditing.title: Precise Editing
preciseEditing.description: Frame-perfect cutting and editing tools for high-quality videos.

aiGenerated.title: AI-Generated Assets
aiGenerated.description: Use AI to generate music, image, video and more for your videos.

exportAnywhere.title: Export Anywhere
exportAnywhere.description: Export to any format and share directly to social platforms.

openSource.title: Open-Source
openSource.description: Built on open-source technologies and available to everyone.

community.title: Join our community
community.description: VideoSOS is an open-source project. Star us on GitHub and contribute to help shape the future of AI-powered video editing.

footer.tagline: Open-source AI video editor built for creators.

metadata.title: VideoSOS | AI Video Editor
metadata.description: Open-source AI video editor that runs entirely in your browser.

leftPanel.emptyMessage: Create your image, audio and voiceover collection to compose your videos

projectDialog.title: New Project
projectDialog.description: Create a new or open an existent project
projectDialog.generateTooltip: Out of ideas? Generate a new random project.
projectDialog.footerText: This is an {openSource} project. Created by {author}, forked from the original {falKit}.
projectDialog.author: Nerual Dreming

keyDialog.title: Access Key
keyDialog.footerText: You can get your FAL Key from {link}.

exportDialog.title: Export video
exportDialog.description: This may take a while, sit back and relax.

mediaGallery.title: Media Gallery
mediaGallery.description: The b-roll for your video composition

toast.enhancePromptFailedDesc: There was an unexpected error. Try again.
toast.generateMediaFailedDesc: Please ensure you've set your FAL KEY in the settings.
toast.suggestionFailedDesc: There was an unexpected error while generating a suggestion. Try again.
